course.title: MAT 1322 Calculus II (3 units)
course.desc: Improper integrals. Applications of the integral. Separable differential equations. Euler's method for differential equations. Sequences, series. Taylor's formula and series. Functions of two and three variables. Partial derivatives, the chain rule, directional derivatives, tangent planes and normal lines.Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisite: MAT 1320. The courses MAT 1322, MAT 1303, MAT 1332, MAT 1325 cannot be combined for units.
